{"title":"Home Assistant", "message":"The front door has been left open"}

name: Turn off all outdoor xmas stuff
mapped commands info
info:
RECLINER:
no recline - InstantReplay
full recline - Info
feet up - Back
nudge up - Up
nudge down - Down
headrest - Home

SCENES:
bright - Search
dimmed - BackSpace

LIGHTS
dimmer up - Up
dimmer down - Down

name: Bedtime Switch on via alarm being armed
